name: Matrix Path
description: A Procedural Path-building Puzzle game where you uncover paths to the exit, uses WFC to generate levels, and Fuzzy Logic to control how hard a level will be.
purpose: This was build for our University Thesis where the problem is trying to solve the pacing control of procedurally generated puzzle games.

name: Spirit Guardian
description: Spirit Guardian is a 2D Action-Adventure prototype with the theme of aswang belief of the Philippines
purpose: Prototype to explore combat feel and animation timing for fast-paced 2D action. Currently reviving this project

name: Combat System
description: A prototype of a Melee Combat System where it can handle any type of weapon. It uses raycasting to detect hits and apply damage to the target.
purpose: Build a reusable melee framework to test hit detection, combos, and weapon behaviors.
